articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: European leaders worry they’re too reliant on U.S. tech - TechCrunch
articles.description: European governments may be reconsidering their use of American technology and services, according to a new report in The New York Times.
articles.content:

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Psyche keeps its date with an asteroid, but now it’s running in backup mode - Ars Technica
articles.description: Engineers switched to a backup fuel line less than a quarter of the way through Psyche’s mission.
